headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Arena Wars Creator
content:
Become an architect of mass destruction and mass entertainment in one fell swoop with the Arena War Creator, now available in GTA Online.

Create your own Arena Vehicle Deathmatches and Arena Races using any of the three arena styles. Set special lighting rigs and arena props and practice your maniacal laughter for when your friends say they have what it takes.

And if that wasnâ€™t quite enough, After Hours vehicles are now available in the other creators.
